comment: I was unfortunately turned down from mine, yesterday, since I got COVID (mild) after my first vax and wasnt quite out of the quarantine woods yet. Ugh.I was able to reschedule for next week, though, which is apparently still in the necessary timeframe.The st vax worked wonders!

      :snt1 (t / turn-down-05

                              :ARG1 (t3 / thing

                                          :op1 "COVID")
                                    :ARG1-of (m2 / mild-02))
                              :time (a2 / after

                                                :op1 "Vax")
                                          :poss ii

                                    :mod (q / quarantine))
                              :degree (q2 / quite)
                              :time (y2 / yet)))))
      :snt2 (u / ugh

      :snt3 (p2 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (r / reschedule-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (w2 / week

                        :mod (s / still)

      :snt4 (w3 / work-09
            :ARG1 (p3 / product
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "St"
                        :op2 "Vax"))
            :mod (w4 / wonder)))
